Description:
Generates ice around the player when respawned after falling in an [[KCL flag#Fall Boundary (0x10)|icy water fall boundary]] flag; the location does not matter, the ice effect is always enabled. The ice's scale and position for each vehicle is defined in [[kartPartsDispParam.bin]] and [[bikePartsDispParam.bin]].
This object can be used to enable tracks for slot [[Slot#6.1|6.1]], but it only has impact in combination with an icy boundary flag. In this case, it only works on slot 6.1.
